name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Field Engineer with a robust background in Software Engineering, I bring 8 years of expertise in developing high-performance solutions, specifically tailored to the healthcare and financial sectors. My technical proficiency includes **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, alongside full-stack development frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I have extensive cloud experience with **Azure** and **AWS**.
I excel in delivering enterprise-grade platforms, integrating AI/ML capabilities, and ensuring compliance with industry standards. My foundational experience in mechanical and electrical engineering complements my role, as I successfully lead system commissioning and corrective and preventive actions. 
I am committed to providing exemplary customer service, utilizing tools like **Salesforce** to enhance client interactions, while maintaining a strong command of English and Nordic languages. My driving license facilitates on-site engagement and collaboration, thereby enhancing project outcomes.
